long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the current Ethereum (ETH) price.

Simple tool that displays the current price of Ethereum (ETH) on the Chrome toolbar and refreshes the price every 30 seconds. Clicking on the badge icon will also manually refresh the price.

When price rises, the badge icon will momentary turn green.
When price drops, the badge icon will momentarily turn red.
